title.narrative: Valorisation de la Scholarisation de la Fille (VAS-Y FIlle!)

description.narrative: The objective of VAS-Y Fille! is to ensure that marginalized girls in the targeted provinces complete primary school and demonstrate improved learning outcomes. The project included four dimensions: (i) increased parental financial capacity to support girls to succeed in and complete primary school, (ii) improved girls’ reading and math skills, (iii) increased community involvement to ensure girls’ access to quality education in a safe environment, and (iv) increased civil society engagement in providing alternative learning opportunities for over-aged, out-of-school girls.
